title: Integrated assessment of environmental and economic impact of municipal solid waste incineration for power generation: A case study in China
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Hongtao Sun, Wen Li, Jing Wang, Xiaopeng Qin, Lijian Jin, Fei Tian, Tongsuo Yang, Feng Zhang, Leping Chen, Yifei Shi, Xueliang Yuan
